original_text: The Israelite soldiers saw the sign and they attacked the soldiers of Benjamin. The men of Benjamin suddenly became very afraid. They realized that they were in a lot of trouble.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람은 돌아서는지라 베냐민 사람들이 화가 자기들에게 미친 것을 보고 심히 놀라

sentences.original_text: The Israelite soldiers saw the sign
and they attacked the soldiers of Benjamin
The men of Benjamin suddenly became very afraid
They realized that they were in a lot of trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 큰 곤경에 처했다는 것을 깨달았습니다
